introduction: This calculator gives you an estimate for your business rates.
more_information: You will need to know the 'rateable value' of your property. You can find it on the [Valuation Office Agency website.](http://www.2010.voa.gov.uk/rli/en/basic/find "Find the rateable value of your property"){:rel="external"}
overview: Use this calculator to estimate your business rates bill
title: Business rates calculator
